permafrost.tundra.server

Class SystemHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.server.SystemHelper

  • public class SystemHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with the webMethods Integration Server system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static com.wm.data.IData getIntegrationServerProperties()
      Returns information about Integration Server such as the software version, environment settings, Java properties, well-known directory locations, and memory usage.
      static com.wm.data.IData getMemoryUsage()
      Returns the Java heap memory usage for the currently executing JVM process.
      static com.wm.data.IData getSystemDirectories()
      Returns the locations of well-known Integration Server directories.
      static com.wm.data.IData getSystemEnvironment()
      Returns the current system environment variables.
      static com.wm.data.IData getSystemProperties()
      Returns the current system properties.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
